page.title: 03Parish Magazine of Hanley's
page.content:
Although offering a platform to the
local churches,the magazine aims to be very much a village magazine and to further a sense of village community and commitment;it seeks to provide a channel for communication,information and interest,particularly of local concern but often also of national and worldwide significance.Within,apart from the vicar's letter and details of services and church rotas,are a wide range of articles -cookery recipes, suggestions of books to read,perhaps an article on another country or a craft or hobby,or local reminiscences, details of forthcoming events,club reports,and the always popular back page (or sometimes pages) of local news-the"snippets."
